schema.description: This is the schema for plugins as defined and consumed by the openproject class. Each plugin contains information to install, and remove itself from a given project.

key.name: instance_type
key.description: instance_type is the optional meta type of an element of packagename that should be installed.

key.name: default
key.description: Is the plugin installed into new projects by default

key.name: swallow_errors
key.description: if true, then exceptions raised during plugin initialization will be caught and ignored
